price: 66. „Dangų ir žemės ir visko, kas tarp jų, Viešpats, Visa Galingas, Visa Atleidžiantis.“
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
